content:
With flu season in full swing it is more important than ever for OSU students to be aware of the services University Health Services is providing PERIOD

Monday through Friday UHS will offer flu shots to students faculty and staff from  a.m PERIOD and  p.m PERIOD

Strategic communications sophomore Spencer Hart said he plans to take advantage of the free flu shots UHS is offering PERIOD

 Hart said PERIOD 

Rachel Shreffler Health Education coordinator said UHS sees plenty of students like Hart seeking the shot during flu season PERIOD

 Shreffler said PERIOD 

Although students probably have full schedules during the school week slipping into UHS to get the free flu shot will likely be a quick experience PERIOD

 Shreffler said PERIOD
